name: Auto Layout Grids
description:
💪🏻 Use the native Figma »Layout Grids« together with Auto Layout!


✨ Supports default grids, copying from other frames and local grid styles!


🥳 Once you've added any grid to the Auto Layout Frame, you can edit/extend/use it the way you like, since it's the figma native grids, you can also add grids from libraries of course.
